quest.name: Declaration of Blood
journal: Fray has been watching you, and shehe is not pleased with your progress.

The voice is waiting to be heard, yet you cannot seem to grasp it on your own. Though disappointed, Fray will help you to understand its intent. Only communion will suffice. Moraby Drydocks will be where you conduct the rites next.

Where do these people come from!? These helpless, hopeless weaklings who see fit to beg the assistance of every passing adventurer. And now comes another, beseeching the Warrior of Light to recover some stolen chest or crate of only the gods know what! The merchant claims the Qiqirn bandits and their leader will prove worthy prey, but we have been disappointed before...

All around you lay the remains of Qiqirn, hacked to pieces, some beyond recognition. Chest heaving with exertion, you gaze at the bloodstained sword in your hands, uncertain how long you have held it. The pounding in your head intensifies, and you blink back the pain. Fray... Where is Fray...?
Fray looks how you feel─utterly spent and in need of a rest. “Finish it,” shehe says. “Finish what we started...”

Madness! Utter madness! That spineless sack of shite actually demanded compensation for his property! The nerve of these people, after all we do for them! But Fray was not about to let that pass, oh no! It was a thing of glory, Fray giving voice to our feelings. Our words tumbling from Fray's mouth. But why did shehe have to leave? Where could shehe have gone?
Fray fears for us. SheHe knows we cannot go on like this. The voice...we must hearken to the voice...

Fray is right, of course. Fray has always been right. Only when we have renounced everything are we free to do anything. We can leave it behind─all of it. The Scions. The Alliance. Even Hydaelyn. All we have to do is ask, and shehe shall set us free.

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Fray upon reaching level 50.
objectives: Rendezvous with Fray at the Moraby Drydocks.
Speak with Fray on the Salt Strand.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...I'm beginning to question your commitment, Forename.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You haven't heard the voice since our last communion, which means you haven't taken my lessons to heart.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You know I'm trying to help you, don't you? All of this is for your benefit.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You listen, but you don't understand─

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...Never mind.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You're the stubborn type. I know that. We'll just have to keep at it until you open your eyes.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Moraby Drydocks. That's where we'll head next.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...Never much cared for the ocean, myself.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: That friend of mine─the one I told you about after our first communion. We came out here together, once.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Long story short, we ended up doing something ridiculously foolish and were lucky to make it out alive.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I tried to talk herhim out of it, but shehe just had to get on that damn boat...

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: (-???-)Don't be like that, friend! Isn't the Maelstrom supposed to aid the smallfolk when they're in a spot of trouble?

dialogue.name: STYRNLONA
dialogue.text: So far as it is possible, yes, but...such matters fall within the purview of the Yellowjackets, and─

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: And they told me to bugger off─can you believe that!? I'm begging you, Sergeant!

dialogue.name: STYRNLONA
dialogue.text: I... Wait. Is that you, [GC Rank] SurnameForename?

dialogue.name: STYRNLONA
dialogue.text: It is! The legend herselfhimself! Forgive me, madamsir, I never thanked you properly for your service to Limsa Lominsa. When I first heard Leviathan had been summoned, I feared that─

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: Why, if it isn't that famous adventurer who's been killing primals left and right!

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: Truly, the Twelve must be watching over me, because you're just the womanman I need!

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: <sniffle> <sob> I...I am the victim of a terrible─nay, heinous crime! I was waylaid by Qiqirn bandits near the Salt Strand, who left me with naught more than the clothes on my back!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...And what makes you think I give a Qiqirn's arse about your troubles? Go and bother the Yellowjackets, like the sergeant said.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I seek worthy prey, not a gang of rats.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: How can you say such a thing, madamsir!? Without your help, I'm ruined!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Fine, I'll help.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Not my problem.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: Spoken like a true hero!

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: So you know, the rank and file didn't seem so dangerous, but their leader was a mean-looking bastard...

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: But considering the foes you've faced in the past, he couldn't possibly pose a threat to you!

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: W-Wait, just listen! You said you wanted worthy prey, yes!?

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: Their leader was a mean-looking bastard, at least two or three times the size of the others. It'd probably take a dozen men to bring him down!

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: If it's a challenge you want, then there it is! Just you against him and his cronies! What say you, madamsir?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Shut your mouth and wait here. I'll be back.

dialogue.name: STYRNLONA
dialogue.text: You really don't have to do this, madamsir...

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: You'll find them on the Salt Strand, madamsir. That's where they made camp. Only mind their leader, eh? He's a mean-looking bastard, that one.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: If this Qiqirn isn't everything he promised, I'll take it out of his hide...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Let's make the most of this, Forename. No style, no guile, just chaos. Mark your limits, then push yourself beyond. Let the darkness guide you and set you free.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Heh...heh... You did well...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: All that's left...is to return the goods to their owner...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...Finish it... Finish what we started...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: The hard part is over... Now finish it...

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: Ah, it's you! Were you able to catch up with those bandits?

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: Er, yes...that seems to be mine, but...

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: ...Llymlaen take me, I can't sell this!

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: Everything's soaked through with Qiqirn blood! What did you do─carve one open and leave him to bleed all over my wares!?

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: I'm ruined...utterly ruined.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: MadamSir, I demand recompense for your reckless destruction of my property!

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: I am a reasonable man, so I will acknowledge that you are not wholly responsible. Fifty percent of the value should suffice.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Fifty percent? FIFTY PERCENT!?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I slaughter a gang of Qiqirn bandits for your precious goods and this is the thanks I receive!?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You spineless sack of shite. I kill your enemies. I fetch your things. I do what you people can't or won't do yourselves.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You're helpless. Weak. All you do is want and need.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I should've left you all to drown in Leviathan's tidal wave. At least then I would've been spared your constant bloody whining.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Do not speak to me of this ever again.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: P-Pray forgive me my insolence, madamsir!

dialogue.name: STYRNLONA
dialogue.text: [GC Rank] SurnameForename, madamsir, I... You have every right to be upset, but...

dialogue.name: STYRNLONA
dialogue.text: ...I think he understands, madamsir.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02057
dialogue.text: Never again, madamsir! I promise!

dialogue.name: STYRNLONA
dialogue.text: Honestly, madamsir. I...I don't think you had to...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: We can't keep doing this, Forename. You must see now what it's doing to us... What they're doing to us...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: These...these people...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Never mind them. The voice is all that matters.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: We don't need them to become a dark knight.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: He deserved it. Every word.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Yes...yes, you are right. You must hearken to its words and discover your true calling.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You are close, Forename─so very, very close...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I wish I could tell you. I wish I could make you see.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: But all I can do is guide you on your journey...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Not entirely true, Forename. They have helped you to cultivate the darkness within, in a way. But their help is no longer needed.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: All that remains is to hearken to the voice─to grasp its words and discover your true calling.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I wish I could tell you. I wish I could make you see.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: But all I can do is guide you on your journey...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Hah...hahaha! Right you are, Forename! Right you are!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Felt good, didn't it? Seeing that sniveling wretch tremble. I think he nearly pissed himself!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You're finally starting to see them for what they are now, aren't you? Good, good.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: All that remains is to hearken to the voice─to grasp its words and discover your true calling...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With every breath you grow lighter and slip further into the abyss...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)A chorus of voices cries out for a hero, and shehe comes.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)SheHe smiles. SheHe nods. And shehe remains silent...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)But shehe too has a voice...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)I will be heard...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...Forename Surname.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...You stand at the precipice, but do not fear the fall.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Cast yourself into the abyss, and you shall soar above, free at last.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: There are other lands than these, Forename─lands where we are not known. Ask, and we shall quit this place forever.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Only when you have renounced everything are you free to do anything.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: When we meet again, you will give us your answer.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Weak...but plentiful. They may yet suffice...

dialogue.name: BOSS
dialogue.text: Yoyoroon not afraid! Yoyoroon kill you and loot your loots!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Heh...heh... Tenacious bastards... Right, then. The goods.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Good. There's nothing left here for...for...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Not now, dammit! Not when we're so close!
